title: [EXPERIMENTAL] Initial version of distributed package
body_html:
It's not ready for usage yet, but rebasing that massive branch is a pain, so let's merge it for now. It prints a big warning when imported:

================================================================================
                                    WARNING
================================================================================
torch.distributed is a highly experimental package. The API will change without
notice and we're can't guarantee full correctness and expected performance yet.
We'll announce it once it will be ready.

body:
It's not ready for usage yet, but rebasing that massive branch is a pain, so let's merge it for now. It prints a big warning when imported:

```
================================================================================
                                    WARNING
================================================================================
torch.distributed is a highly experimental package. The API will change without
notice and we're can't guarantee full correctness and expected performance yet.
We'll announce it once it will be ready.
```
